description: i-Blason iPad Mini with Retina DisplaySmart Cover Companion SeriesSlim Fit Hard Case Available in Multi Colors. This case adopts an innovative Smart Cover Anchor Lock Design compatible with the original Apple smart covers. The premium material used to make this case is very light in weight yet still has certain flexibility in nature. Thus, it is literally unbreakable after put on and eliminated the corner cracking problem we saw in the other cases on the market.It's Lite as a feather! Fits like a snug.Improved Features--Offer great protections for your iPad--Minimal bulk added to your tablet--Sophisticated matte finish for increased grip and handling--Feather lite and Nano Coating technology helps improve touch, grip and durabilityWhat you get inside:- 1 Premium Smart Cover Compatible Slim Hard Case with Anchor LockProduct Type: Premium Smart Cover Companion Series Lite Hard CaseDevice Model: Apple iPad Mini with Retina Display (2nd Generation) 2013 ReleaseFeatures-Special Nano Coating Technology-Precision and Form Fitted Technology-Super Slim Design-Smart Cover Anchor Locki-BLASON ONE YEAR REPLACEMENT WARRANTYWe are committed to your satisfaction and will send you replacements free of charge. Our commitment to you is that we will keep your device protected, premium quality guaranteed, or your money back.
title: i-BLASON Apple iPad Mini with Retina Display Case (2nd Generation) Hard Snap On Slim-Fit Case (Smart Cover Compatible with Smart Cover Anchor Lock) (Clear)
